name: Puppet Parade
text: If your opponent controls more monsters than you do: Special Summon "Gimmick Puppet" monsters with different names from your Deck, up to the difference, then, if your opponent's LP are at least 2000 higher than yours, you can Set 1 "Rank-Up-Magic" Normal Spell directly from your Deck. For the rest of this turn after this card resolves, you cannot Special Summon monsters, except "Gimmick Puppet" monsters. You can only activate 1 "Puppet Parade" per turn.
